climatePledgeFriendly.details: ENERGY STAR Most Efficient recognizes the best of ENERGY STAR certified products with highest efficiency and maximum carbon reductions.

features: BLUEAIR’S TOP-PERFORMING AIR PURIFIER LINE: Blue family’s new Pure Max series with our proprietary HEPASilent performance now even better with up to 83% faster cleaning and 50% less noise*
LET’S CLEAR THE AIR QUIETER: Quiet Mark certified (18-46dB); Cleans up to 526sqft living space in 30min or 219sqft in about 12.5min on high
LET’S CLEAR THE AIR FASTER: HEPASilent dual filtration technology delivers more clean air faster and uses less noise and energy than HEPA filtration alone**

LET’S CLEAR THE AIR BETTER: Removes at least 99.97% of tiny airborne particles like viruses and smoke down to 0.1 microns, and captures pet dander, pollen, mold allergen and dust; carbon filter traps light household odors from smoking, pets and cooking***
LET’S CLEAR THE AIR EASIER: Intuitive display, 5-color AQI, and simple two-button design make it easy to control fan speed 1 – 3 including night mode, auto, brightness and child lock
BLUEAIR REPLACEMENT FILTER: Blue Pure 411a Max Genuine Replacement Filter; Blue Pure F4MAX; B08KPJQBQT fits Blue Pure 411a Max Air Purifier and is designed for optimal performance

INDEPENDENTLY TESTED FOR PERFORMANCE & SAFETY, ZERO OZONE: AHAM Verifide for Performance (CADR); Quiet Mark Certified; Ozone Safety Standards Certified by CARB; Zero Ozone Verified (<5 ppb) by Intertek Sustainability
LET’S CLEAR THE AIR WITH LESS ENERGY: Energy Star Most Efficient 2023; Blueair air purifiers use less energy (as low as 2.5W – 20W depending on fan speed) and less than an LED lightbulb on low

LET’S CLEAR THE AIR WITH BLUEAIR: Our Blue Pure Max air purifier comes with one filter preinstalled and a pre-filter for easy set up; This product is made for NORTH AMERICA USE ONLY and should only be used with input voltages between 110-120V
body.description: Blue Pure 411a Max HEPASilent™ air purifier quickly cleans up to 526sqft living space in 30min or 219sqft in about 12.5min on high. Independently evaluated for safety standards and third-party tested for performance as part of the AHAM Verifide® Program for air cleaners, this air purifier has a Clean Air Delivery Rate (CADR) of 141 for fine smoke particles, dust and pollen. Blueair is the only line of air purifiers with a customizable, washable fabric pre-filter. Inspired by the latest Scandinavian design trend, Blue Pure Max air purifiers arrive in the Stockholm Fog pre-filter, while Limestone, Moss and Sand pre-filters are sold separately. Shop genuine Blueair Blue Pure F4MAX replacement filter designed for optimal performance: Blue Pure 411a Max air purifier replacement filter B08KPJQBQT. *Comparing pollen CADR on high fan speed (Blue Pure 411a Max & 411i Max vs. Blue 411 Auto), other units may vary. Based on AHAM maximum allowable certified rating which may vary from the AHAM seal claimed valued. Noise refers to the dB(A) difference in acoustic power. **When similar CADR was measured, Blueair models with mechanical and electrostatic filtration achieved less noise with less energy than same models with only H13 HEPA mechanical filtration. ***Tested PM 2.5 (0.1 - 2.5 microns) up to 90min in a 30m3 room. Tested to remove min. 99.9% of S. aureus, K. pneumoniae, P. aeruginosa, MS2, E.Coli, H1N1, A.Niger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and quiet, but mighty!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this little air cleaner for a small room. It immediately began working to make the air more fresh and clean smelling. Have kept it running 24/7 so far without issue. Very quiet. Also attractive. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great budget purifier with AUTO feature!
reviews.reviewText: Having an AQI sensor with an auto mode is pretty rare for purifiers at this price range. BlueAir is really cool for creating something inexpensive to be a set it and forget. I’ve tested and tried many different air purifiers and while I have a favorite already, this one really deserves its praises. For starters, I want to say this is definitely a bedroom-centric purifier and isn’t meant for larger open concept spaces (Opt for the 311 Auto for bigger area). The 411 auto is virtually silent on level 1. Level 2 is also pretty quiet but has a very gentle breeze sound (personally my fav for sleeping bc the white noise is calming). Level 3 definitely is a jump in sound but is good for brief quick air cleaning. Auto mode is pretty accurate with detection rate. I put out a candle that was relatively close proximity to the purifier and the sensor light turned red and gradually revved up to sift out the smoke. In another test, I blew out a candle that was further away from the purifier across the room. The sensor did take longer to begin revving up the fan (about 5 mins give or take) but nonetheless still managed to detect. I find dissipation of odors and smoke to be pretty decent. Today I was indecisive about outfits and tried on many diff things while looking in the mirror and I guess all the dust and lint kicked up and got the little guy revving up. All this to say, the AQI sensor and Auto Mode is great!Other positives:-low power consumption. It’s gonna be so inexpensive on your electricity bill. Only 10watts of power max!-stylish! The prefilters are very attractive I’m in a very modern minimalist space with black and whites and grays. The default pre filter it ships with fits perfectly! Diff decor? They have many different colors for you.I have to say, I doubted this thing for a bit because of its seemingly lacking power. It reminded me a lot of the Levoit Vista 200. However that model is awfully weak and not worth the money. I believe the reason why the Blue Pure 411 Auto works so efficiently well, is because it is 90% filter. There’s no plastic unibody or restrictive intake grills. Just fabric and filter. Because of this, less fan power is needed to pull in air through several layers of plastic holes and super dense materials. Pretty innovative and a true example of “less is more”. Highly recommend for those who want a stylish, efficient minimalist air purifier for a small space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT in many ways
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size: It takes up very little room on a cabinet top in my bedroom.Perfect volume: The sound is restful, not overwhelming.Perfect air flow: The air that comes out the top is not a force. Merely a breeze.Perfect price: Efficiency at a nominal cost.I recommend this air purifier without reservation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great, but QC issues
reviews.reviewText: I have four Blue Air purifiers - one large one and three smaller ones. The large one works perfectly, but the other three (411a Max) required a gamble in getting one that works properly. I've had to return/buy a few because a couple of them made audible ticking like noises, and one of them smelled so bad I couldn't stand it. Not what I expected from Blue Air, but if you get one that works, they are great! They operate quietly and the fan kicks on higher when it detects particulants in the air. They look attractive too. I just wish quality control was better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the machine, it’s quiet and looks great in our living room. We have a big space and the air definitely feels a lot fresher. Can’t rave about this enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well for basically everything!
reviews.reviewText: Pretty quiet and removes most if not everything I wanted the filter for. I had the older version and upgraded when I move, and I do not have any complaints the volume level is so much lower unless it's on a higher setting. It really does feel like a improvement..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet as a Mouse!
reviews.reviewText: For several months we’ve been considering purchasing a BluAir purifier to remove dust, pollen, and pet dander from the air. Three relatives have purchased this purifier and are very satisfied with its performance. We’ve had ours for a couple weeks and run it 24/7. It really has improved the air quality in our home. No more stuffiness or sneezing from pet dander, dust, etc. and it is very quiet as advertised. We set it on auto which is the recommended setting, and have it in our dining/living area. Our 411a Max is a smaller purifier bc our home is around 1,000 sq.ft. Works great! Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It died after 2 years
reviews.reviewText: It worked great making almost no noise on its lowest modes. However, one day it just went on high speed with no indicator light changing nor did the top button function anymore. Glad I only paid 116$ for it

Je l'utilise maintenant depuis 2 semaines et il fonctionne bien. Silencieux dans la chambre à coucher. Au niveau minimum, on l'entend à peine. J'ai remarqué une diminution de la poussière dans la pièce où il est installé.

reviews.reviewTitle: Remueve el polvo y los malos olores pero esperaba mas.
reviews.reviewText: Remueve el polvo y los malos olores pero esperaba mas. Refresca la habitacion, sin embargo yo buscaba algo que eliminara el polvo de por completo. Tambien creo que funcionaria mejor para habitaciones mas pequeñas. Aunque creo que para su precio esta bien su funcion.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works well out of the box, good value
reviews.reviewText: EffectiveHad this for one day now but already confident it’s working. Was woken up by the fan kicking in last night when the wind shifted and wildfire smoke worsened. Once the window was closed, the filter did it’s job cleaning up the air. In the morning, I ran our far more expensive Dyson. Initially it claimed the air quality was poor…but within moments it updated to good air quality…so the Dyson was satisfied with the air quality from the blueair device. The auto sensor even detected fumes from my hair color.NoiseIt’s a bit loud on the highest setting - not too surprising as the Dyson is loud at high too.OverallIt’s visually appealing for an air purifier. All around happy with it and compared to the pricey Dyson, great value. Going to buy a bigger one - 211 - for the main area of our home.

reviews.reviewTitle: funciono mejor de lo que pense
reviews.reviewText: es muy silencioso, quita todos los olores y se siente de inmecdiato como la calidad del aire mejora

The item arrived quickly and worked as intended, shipped directly from the US by Amazon. It seems to be high quality and looks good. My understanding is that the benefits of this unit are: 1. looks good, 2. uses washable fabric prefilter to take some of the work away from the hepa filter, 3. contains an air quality sensor, 4. has a night mode which is quiet and where the light is dimmed, and 5. probably more importantly, uses the high quality hepa filters from Blueair. My wife trusts the Blueair filters and this is probably the most important differentiator for this product. In other respects, it is similar to other filters which are available. If you like Blueair, I'm happy to recommend this.
